CSSUnparsedValue.summary: The CSSUnparsedValue interface of the CSS Typed Object Model API represents property values that reference custom properties. It consists of a list of string fragments and variable references.

remarks.para: Custom properties are represented by CSSUnparsedValue and {{cssxref("var", "var()")}} references are represented using .
